plot: A kid tries to find his dad, and goes around fighting ants, thieves, video gamers, and another weird people. Oh and their´s also a pedophile clown dude.

Two midgets try to use magical science to bring back their dead mommy, and become cripples [well actually one loses his whole body]. So they try and find a way, to get their body back using the power of science.
Student eats potato chip, becomes mass murderer.
A High Schooler wants to save his blind sister, so he starts a rebellion sponsored by Pizza Hut
Stretchy boy goes around asking people if they poop. But less importantly also tries to find the Pirate King´s treasure.
Not many words are needed, just a whole lot of screaming, killing, and some politics too.
A doctor gets in trouble for saving a little kid, and gets fired. The little kid becomes a crazy sociopath and tries to kill everyone.
A vampire gets his mouth stapled by crab, hilarity ensues
Two men can't kill each other so they team up to find a smelly guy
Guy drinks girl's spit and has a trip and proceeds to saves town's people.
A teacher with a chronic disease is being harrased by a group of students, soldiers, a blonde bitch and a trap
Young Naive Impressionable kid travels the world searching for his dad. He fights grown men, fends off a paedophile and makes a life long friend
Girl decides the best way to seek vengance for her father is to wear skimpy clothing
He wanted a date, she wanted a meal.
Salaryman fights evil spirits with salt-based martial arts.
Dysfunctional couple participates in the Hunger Games
Wannabe homeless cult leader enslaves perverted child to help him get a birdhouse
Two shut in siblings use their incest to rule the world
Satan gets a Job at McDonalds.
Guys finds a 1000 ways to die
A boy travels back in time to prevents his girlfriends death by ask for help from her killer
A boy sexually harasses his schoolmates with his cooking
Ten year old boy gets kicked out of home to join an animal fighting ring
Teenage boys make YouTube Videos
Police plays laser tag with criminals
